segments.text: You have any ideas as to what you want to do this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to the movie theater with my friend . What are you going to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about you see a movie with me and my friend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What movie are you and your friend planning on watching ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not sure . Is there a movie out that catches your eye ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No good movies come to mind .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you decided whether or not you would like to go ?
segments.speaker: S2
